price: „Ако се не оканиш, о Ноја!“ Рекоше они, „бићеш сигурно каменован!“
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
